alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Hamilton; Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 2:34PM CDT until August 12 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cherokee County in southwestern North Carolina... Bradley County in east Tennessee... Polk County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Hamilton County in east Tennessee... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 334 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Charleston to near South Cleveland to Rossville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported trees down in Marion and Hamilton Counties. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Cleveland, Benton, Ducktown, Ridgeside, South Cleveland, East Cleveland, Wildwood Lake, Collegedale, and William L. Davenport Refuge. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 1 and 13, and between mile markers 16 and 31. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
